name: Royal Assault
summary: Royal Assault is a real-time tower defense game set in a medieval fantasy setting. Your people are under attack and you must fend off the invading armies by building towers. Choose the quick-firing Archer Towers to quickly dispatch flying enemies, the hard hitting Mage Towers to penetrate the armor of your toughest foes, the explosive Artillery Towers to do area damage to all ground-based enemies, or opt to build Barracks instead which train soldiers who can stop enemies in their tracks.
